alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; Logan; Macon; Piatt; Sangamon; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 9:01PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and east central Illinois. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon Monday to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; De Witt; Logan; Macon; Piatt; Sangamon; Vermilion
